pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Taft Mega Styling Gel Extreme Hold 300g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Schwarzkopf Taft Mega Styling Gel Maximum Hold offers 24 hours hold with no stickiness.

Definition & Shape - Maximum Hold:

- Designed to define and shape the perfect hairstyle.

- Use to add height or define individual strands.

- Alcohol-free formula combines ultra strong fixing agents with Pro-Vitamin B5 for long-lasting hold and shiny finish.

- For 24h hold without stickiness, without residue and easy to brush out.

Perfect 24h Hold.

Schwarzkopf Taft provides perfect, long-lasting hold and styling protection for your hair regardless of the weather or activity.

Size: 300g

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

If in eyes wash out immediately with water.

Ingredients

Water, VP/VA Copolymer, Sorbitol, Carbomer, Panthenol, Triethanalamine, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Propylene Glycol, PEG-75 Lanolin, Benzophenone-4, Disodium EDTA, Fragrance, Methyl Paraben, DMDM Hydantoin.

Directions

Styling advice:
- Open
- Press back
- Put upside down
Easy to use: No mess dispenser. Store upside down.
Work a small amount between your fingertips or palms, a little goes a long way.
Apply to wet or dry hair and style as desired.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
